#summary Enhancer a Shaman AddOn for World of Warcraft.

= Features: =
 * Totem Timers [Enhancer_TotemFrames info]
  # Ability to turn each element's (earth, fire, water, air) timer on and off
  # Extra WF frame for twisters [Enhancer_WindfuryTotemFrame info]
 * Reincarnation Timer [Enhancer_ReincarnationFrame info]
 * Windfury _"hidden"_ cooldown [Enhancer_WindfuryFrame info]
 * Invigorated [Enhancer_InvigoratedFrame info]
 * Temporary Enchants [Enhancer_TemporaryEnchantsFrames info]
 * Shield (Lightning/Water) [Enhancer_ShieldFrame info]
 * Shield (Water) [Enhancer_WShieldFrame info]
 * Shield (Earth)  [Enhancer_EarthShieldFrame info]
 * Stormstrike [Enhancer_StormstrikeFrame info]
 * Healing Way [Enhancer_HealingWayFrame info]
 * Purge info [Enhancer_Purge info]
 * Attack Power Gauge [Enhancer_APGaugeFrame info]
 * Equivalence Points [Enhancer_EquivalencePoints info]
  # Attackpower
  # Healing
  # spellDamage
  # Itemization Points (Enhancement)

= Details: =
Each frame/button can be turned on and off including individual elements.
